post.body: Hello World! I am looking for a girlfriend

DO NOT use Virtware, terrible customer service and now they just block the wholde node for no reason.
I bought Megavz, cheap vps for couple dollars a year
Several months ago, Virtware bought the Megavz,nanovz's company.
Then, VPS started to get sucks, disk I/O no more than 1MB/s, I can't even run "apt-get update" and network speed is terrible, I ran speedtest-cli multiple times, the results never higher than 5mbps, even lowendspirt vps with 2.xx kernel and 64MB ram is way better than it.
Then, I opened a ticket to complain the unbeatable network and Ryan claims that speedtest is not a reliable network thoughtout test tool , I waited for half minute to connect SSH and can't even download update from repositories and you denied it ?
There is no SLA of uptime
For these months, the server downed for minutes to 6 hours every single day, every time I opened a ticket complains about the downtime,before I got reply, the system up agains in hours right after I submitted it , strange? doesn't it?
Now, I abandoned the server for months and I tried to login today, the portal said the node is blocked?! What the hell?

Since Virtware bought Megavz's company, they never create a homepage

So NEVER buy Virtware
It's a good idea to host a Zeronet proxy ?

Anyone tried ZeroMe+ ?

有沒有人用過 ZeroMe+ ?

Zeronet is awesome, no shadowban, no tailored content, no ads, no 9gag/Facebook army, better privacy ...

Just harmony and skilled user in Zeronet ( Not criticizing newbies )

I feel acceptance in this (small?) community, something can't be found on other social network. Thank you, Zeronet

Hi, Zeronet. It's me (again)
I have just set up a Japan-based proxy server, I need somebody help to test it, please

https://z.jp.akb48.work
or
https://z.jp.akb48.work:43110

THIS IS ONLY A TEMPORARY ADDRESS

for the permanent address, I'll put it in the other post once the dns servers are updated.
